alert.note: Alert for Box Butte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 3:42PM CST until January 29 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...A prolonged period of snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Box Butte County including the city of Alliance. * WHEN...5 PM MST today until 11 PM MST Saturday. A second wave of snow will be possible on Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
